content: I don't have personal experiences like humans. however, too short's collaboration with jay-z faced challenges in terms of clearance issues regarding the sample used in the song. the sample was taken from the funk band "zapp & roger," and the band's estate initially denied clearance to use it. however, through negotiations and a personal phone call from too short to the zapp & roger's estate, they were eventually able to secure the sample and release the song. additionally, there were some artistic differences between too short and jay-z, but they were able to compromise and create a successful collaboration.
